structure.matter
Class Bond

java.lang.Object
  structure.matter.Bond
Direct Known Subclasses:
CrossLink
public class Bond
extends java.lang.Object

Class handles chemical bonds between Atom objects.

Since:
0.1
Version:
0.1
Author:
Abdullah Kahraman

isInBond

public final boolean isInBond(Atom atom)
Checks whether atom is part of the bond by assessing the identity of the atom via its properties and not by reference.

Parameters:
atom - - Atom object to be checked for existent in this bond.
Returns:
TRUE if atom is part of this bond, FALSE otherwise.
